name: Slimey's Sweet Sweep
description:
A short but sweet gamejam project, made over three weeks by two programmers and five artists.

You play as Slimey, who has to slide around a candy factory and collect trash ingredients in order to get the candy production back up to speed.

Features:

  • Physics-driven, bouncy gameplay
  • Online and LAN Coop (up to 10 players!)
  • Colorful environment
  • Ramps, pipes, cookies and biscuits
  • Grannies and rats
  • Secret basement level (or is there?)

clap your hands, if you believe
